sentences.sContent: The headmaster threatened the boys with expulsion.
sentences.sCn: 校长警告这几名男生说要开除他们。

remMethod.val: ex (出) + puls (推) + ion → 推出去 → 逐出； 开除

trans.tranOther: the act of stopping someone from going to the school where they were studying or from being part of the organization where they worked
